DOC.brief_summary: Proof-of-concept study address feasibility awake ECMO ( v/v ) patient acute respiratory failure
DOC.brief_title: Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation ( ECMO ) Non-intubated Patients With Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome ( ARDS )
DOC.detailed_description: Pilot study 6 patient ARDS address use awake veno-venous ECMO avoid endotracheal intubation mechanical ventilation
